scripts.build-min: browserify client.es6.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -g uglifyify -c --standalone OSFClient -o dist/osfclient.min.js || true
scripts.build: browserify client.es6.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] --debug --standalone OSFClient -o dist/osfclient.js || true
scripts.build-dist: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run build-min || true
scripts.watch: watchify client.es6.js --debug -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] --debug --standalone OSFClient -o dist/osfclient.js -v || true
